title: Nationwide Solar Panel Installation with Cutting-Edge Technology
subtitle: We supply and install solar panel systems in Cork, Dublin, Limerick, Wicklow, and nationwide. Our team manages every step: consultation, site survey, design, and installation.

cards.title: Solar PV Systems
cards.description: Our residential solar panel systems transform how Irish homeowners power their homes. Our systems work in all weather, producing clean electricity all year round.
bullets: Sell excess electricity to the grid

cards.title: Commercial Solar
cards.description: Commercial solar PV helps Irish businesses cut operational costs while demonstrating environmental responsibility. We install systems that match usage, location, and business objectives.
bullets: SEAI grants up to €162,600 for businesses
Reduce energy costs by up to 75%
